title: How to start writing a script for a short film - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How do I start writing a script for a short film? A: Well for one thing, maybe check this book out: The Art of the Short Fiction Film: A Shot by Shot Study of Nine Modern Classics: Richard Raskin: 9780786411832: Amazon.com: Books And, see: Five Parameters for Story Design (in the short film)  There’s a free book (PDF) on film writing, here (on my PhD blog): StoryAlity #28 – Screenwriting Manuals since 1911 Screenwriting software, like say: Trelby, or Final Draft or Causality is helpful for formatting. One of my short films: Rocket Man, (Rated R). The incredibly true story of Darwin Edward Cole - "the serial killer who saved the world."  A good idea is: look at the scripts for Short Films you like, see how they did it…
A2A. The same way you start writing a script for a long film. Lauri Donahue's answer to How can I become a better screenwriter?
